name: Elefunk
description:
Use your construction skills to save elephants from a dangerous fall! In the new puzzle game Elefunk™, your elephants must traverse 20 levels of ravines, rivers, fire pits and swamps – and they’ll only get across if you strengthen the structures correctly with metal, wood and rope. It’s real construction with realistic physics and three different game modes: Time Attack, Puzzle, and Deconstruction – a multiplayer mode where players have to remove pieces from the structure without causing it to fall. Also supports online leaderboards. Get building today!

Elefunk™ ©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Published by Sony Computer Entertainment America, Inc. Developed by 8bit Games Ltd. Elefunk is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. All rights reserved.

One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
